definition: (boxing) a blow with the fist, strike heavily, especially with the fist or a bat
details:
noun
- (boxing) a blow with the fist
- any of various terrestrial gastropods having an elongated slimy body and no external shell
- a projectile that is fired from a gun
= synonyms: bullet
- a strip of type metal used for spacing
= synonyms: type slug
- an amount of a drink, often alcoholic, that is gulped or poured
= example: an amount of a drink, often alcoholic, that is gulped or poured
- an idle slothful person
= synonyms: sluggard
- a counterfeit coin
- a unit of mass equal to the mass that accelerates at 1 foot/sec/sec when acted upon by a force of 1 pound
verb
- strike heavily, especially with the fist or a bat
= example: strike heavily, especially with the fist or a bat
= synonyms: swig, slog
- be idle
= synonyms: idle, laze, stagnate
